zone.line: "And Good things of day begin to droop & drowze
And nights black agents to their prey do rouze
But mark how beautiful an order
has sprung from the dust & blood of this
fierce chaos! how the World as from
a resurrection balancing itself on the
golden wings of knowledge & of hope,
has
reassumed its yet unwearied flight
into the Heaven of time — listen to
the music unheard by outward ears
which is as a ceaseless & invisible
wind nourishing its everlasting course
with strength & swiftness.
The poetry in the doctrines of Jesus
Christ, and the mythology & institutions
of the Celtic conquerors of the Roman
empire, outlived the darkness & the
convulsions connected with thier growth
& victory, & blended themselves into a
new fabric of manners & opinion. It
is an error to impute the ignorance
